Take your fear and meekness;

and replace it with the courage to do what must be done!

Who am I?

Hello, thank you for stopping by to see my little project. My name is Elise and I am very passionate about coding and the art of story telling.

I have dreamed about sharing my work with the world, but too shy and intimadated by traditional publishing procedures, so I took my knowledge of coding

and turned to the internet to create this website.

I hope you like what you see! I will continue to update this project and add more content to my stories as inspiration continues to strike me.

With pleasure, Elise.
